Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir,

While the police commander of this district was engaged in the task of arresting some deserters from the 8th Corps of National Guards, he apprehended one from the 1st Line, whom I hereby forward to Your Excellency, Francisco Fabiano da Silva, and I do not mention the battalion to which he belongs because he does not know it, or does not wish to declare it. This is what I am obliged to report and I have the honor to bring it to the respectful knowledge of Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency.  
Military Command Headquarters of the municipality of Santo Antônio, Santo Antônio, December 7, 1842.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Barão de Caxias, Distinguished President and General-in-Chief of the Army.  
Antônio de Melo e Albuquerque  
Colonel Military Commander of the municipality of Santo Antônio.
